mapper.update:
update sync_stock_basic
TS_CODE = #{tsCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SYMBOL = #{symbol,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STOCK_NAME = #{stockName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AREA = #{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INDUSTRY = #{industry,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
FULL_NAME = #{fullName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EN_NAME = #{enName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CN_SPELL = #{cnSpell,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MARKET = #{market,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STOCK_EXCHANGE = #{stockExchange,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CURR_TYPE = #{currType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LIST_STATUS = #{listStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LIST_DATE = #{listDate,jdbcType=DATE},
DELIST_DATE = #{delistDate,jdbcType=DATE},
IS_HS = #{isHs,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATION_DATE = #{creationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LAST_UPDATE_DATE = #{lastUpdateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
DELETE_FLAG = #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT},
VERSION = #{version,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where STOCK_BASIC_ID = #{stockBasicId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update sync_stock_basic set TS_CODE = #{tsCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYMBOL = #{symbol,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STOCK_NAME = #{stockName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AREA = #{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INDUSTRY = #{industry,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, FULL_NAME = #{fullName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EN_NAME = #{enName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CN_SPELL = #{cnSpell,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MARKET = #{market,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STOCK_EXCHANGE = #{stockExchange,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CURR_TYPE = #{currType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LIST_STATUS = #{listStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LIST_DATE = #{listDate,jdbcType=DATE}, DELIST_DATE = #{delistDate,jdbcType=DATE}, IS_HS = #{isHs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATION_DATE = #{creationDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, LAST_UPDATE_DATE = #{lastUpdateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, DELETE_FLAG = #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=TINYINT}, VERSION = #{version,jdbcType=BIGINT} where STOCK_BASIC_ID = #{stockBasicId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
